org.appspot.apprtc

Class RoomParametersFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.appspot.apprtc.RoomParametersFetcher

  • public class RoomParametersFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    AsyncTask that converts an AppRTC room URL into the set of signaling parameters to use with that room.
